DOC.brief_summary: Recently , American College Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) recommend delay 30-60 second umbilical cord clamp newborn infant . This delay allow newborn receive his/her blood placenta ( placental transfusion ) help transition first hour life . The purpose study learn amount blood flow baby 's heart normal newborn transition
DOC.brief_title: Changes Cardiac Output During Delayed Umbilical Cord Clamping
DOC.criteria: Healthy full term infant Delivered vaginal birth Estimated gestational age 37+0to 41+6 week correct gestational age Multiples Known fetal anomaly ( include cardiac defect ) . Instrumentation delivery ( forceps vacuum ) Nonreducible nuchal cord delivery . Any maternal neonatal indication require immediate cord clamping .
